sample.title: Client SDK - Samples
sample.section:
Here are a set of samples to show how client SDK works.
Service Configuration Sample Servlet The sample files are provided to help using Access Manager's Service Configuration component within a web application.
[Click]
User Profile (Attributes) Sample Servlet The sample files are provided to help using Access Manager's User Management component within a web application.
[Click]
Policy Evaluator Client Sample Servlet The sample files are provided to help using Access Manager's Policy Client component within a web application.
[Click]
Single Sign On Token Verification Servlet This sample demonstrates the usage of retrieving the user profile from a single sign on token. You need to authenticate to the server first to have the set set. Login as amadmin for example.
[Click]
